verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:4
verses.text: And he appointed certain of the Levites to minister before the ark of the Lord, and to record, and to thank and praise the Lord God of Israel:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:5
verses.text: Asaph the chief, and next to him Zechariah, Jeiel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Mattithiah, and Eliab, and Benaiah, and Obed–edom: and Jeiel with psalteries and with harps; but Asaph made a sound with cymbals;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:6
verses.text: Benaiah also and Jahaziel the priests with trumpets continually before the ark of the covenant of God.
